page.title: 20British Bulldog-a game
page.content: Three or more people can play this game.One person is "it" or "bulldog". There are two homes or bases."Bulldog" then shouts,"British Bulldog,one,two, three."The idea then is to run from one base to the other without being caught by "Bulldog". If "Bulldog" catches someone,he has to lift him up and say,"British Bulldog one,two,three."If the person is too heavy then "Bulldog" just has to touch him.The person who is caught first is "Bulldog" in the next game.If you are caught during the game,you are instantly made a "Bulldog",which means that you too, try to catch other players.
